sen.j: 若い頃は彼女との疎遠を父・舅に嘆かれていた。
sen.e: His estrangement with her in his youth deplored his father and his father-in-law.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: His estrangement with her in his youth deplored his father and his father-in-law.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Their estrangement while still young was deplored by his father and father-in-law.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。余分な）を削除しました。

sen.j: しかし、壮年期には病床の柏木を二人で看病する姿が描かれている。
sen.e: However, in the prime of his life, the state that he and Yon no Kimi looked after Kashiwagi, who was in bed for illness, was depicted.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, in the prime of his life, the state that he and Yon no Kimi looked after Kashiwagi, who was in bed for illness, was depicted.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: However, I the prime of his life he and Yon no Kimi are depicted looking after the sick and bedridden Kashiwagi together.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 側室では雲居の雁の母（王族出身）と夕顔 (源氏物語)（三位中将の娘、玉鬘 (源氏物語)の母）が知られる。
sen.e: The mother of Kumoi no Kari (from a royal family) and Yugao (in Tale of Genji) (a daughter of Sanmi no Chujo (lieutenant general of Sakone-fu with Sanmi rank) and the mother of Tamakazura (in Tale of Genji) are known as his concubines.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The mother of Kumoi no Kari (from a royal family) and Yugao (in Tale of Genji) (a daughter of Sanmi no Chujo (lieutenant general of Sakone-fu with Sanmi rank) and the mother of Tamakazura (in Tale of Genji) are known as his concubines.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: His concubines were known to be the mother of Kumoi no Kari (of royal descent) and Yugao (the daughter of Sanmi no Chujo and the mother of Tamakazura).
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: しかし雲居の雁の母は後に離婚して按察大納言と再婚（この時雲居の雁は祖母大宮に預けられた）。
sen.e: Later, however, the mother of Kumoino Kari divorced him and married Azechino Dainagon (Major Counselor) (at this time, Kumoino Kari was entrusted to her grand mother, Omiya).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Later, however, the mother of Kumoino Kari divorced him and married Azechino Dainagon (Major Counselor) (at this time, Kumoino Kari was entrusted to her grand mother, Omiya).
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: However, the mother of Kumoi no Kari later divorced him and married Azechino Dainagon (at which time Kumoi no Kari came under the care of her grandmother Omiya).
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 夕顔は正妻の脅しにあって姿を消してしまった。
sen.e: Yugao was scared by the legal wife and disappeared.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Yugao was scared by the legal wife and disappeared.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Yugao disappeared after being threatened by his legal wife.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: また一時情けをかけたらしい相手として、近江の君を産んだ身分低い女性がいる。
sen.e: There also existed a woman in a lower class to whom he was kind for a while and gave birth to Omi no Kimi.
There also existed a woman in a lower class to whom he was kind for a while and gave birth to Omi no Kimi.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Also, he seems for a time to have taken pity on a lower class woman who went on to give birth to Omi no Kimi.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。
